publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7672 Stewart Stevenson: Photographic Success for Fraserburgh Academy—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and teachers of Fraserburgh Academy on the school’s success in the Focus Environment photography competition; notes that, out of twenty-four prizes, four Fraserburgh Academy pupils were responsible for winning five separate prizes, two more prize-winning pupils than any other school; believes that photography helps to encourage a healthy respect for Scotland’s environment, and commends all participating pupils on the high standard of their entries.

S3M-7672 Photographic Success for Fraserburgh Academy (lodged on 10 January 2011) Nanette Milne*, Alasdair Allan*, Pauline McNeill*, Brian Adam*, Jamie Stone*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Des McNulty*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-7672 Photographic Success for Fraserburgh Academy (lodged on 10 January 2011) Robin Harper*, Jamie Hepburn*, Alison McInnes*, Hugh Henry*

S3M-7672 Stewart Stevenson: Photographic Success for Fraserburgh Academy—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and teachers of Fraserburgh Academy on the school’s success in the Focus Environment photography competition; notes that, out of twenty-four prizes, four Fraserburgh Academy pupils were responsible for winning five separate prizes, two more prize-winning pupils than any other school; believes that photography helps to encourage a healthy respect for Scotland’s environment, and commends all participating pupils on the high standard of their entries. Supported by: Nanette Milne, Alasdair Allan, Pauline McNeill, Brian Adam, Jamie Stone, Joe FitzPatrick, Des McNulty, Bill Kidd, Kenneth Gibson, Gil Paterson, Robin Harper, Jamie Hepburn, Alison McInnes, Hugh Henry, Maureen Watt*
S3M-7672 Photographic Success for Fraserburgh Academy (lodged on 10 January 2011) Stuart McMillan*
